attributes.action: erect a safety camera on Lincoln Road, near to Holdingham Roundabout in Sleaford, Lincolnshire; in response to the recent fatality of Elliot Lowe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 25th June 2008, Elliot Lowe, aged 20, lost his life to a speeding van coming off of Holdingham Roundabout to the north of Sleaford, Lincolnshire. We would like to see the government erect a safety camera to stop this tragedy from reoccuring.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "erect a safety camera on Lincoln Road, near to Holdingham Roundabout in Sleaford, Lincolnshire; in response to the recent fatality of Elliot Lowe."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17073


Prime Minister's Office
